original_subtitles_map: {"1":{"id":1,"start":25.971,"end":30.791,"text":"나에게도 언젠가는 따순 봄이 오겠죠","index":0},"2":{"id":2,"start":31.041,"end":35.681,"text":"거칠게 휘몰아치는 이 겨울을 헤치고","index":1},"3":{"id":3,"start":36.161,"end":40.961,"text":"나는 그때 위해 찻잔을 닦아 놓겠어요","index":2},"4":{"id":4,"start":41.861,"end":46.371,"text":"언제든지 나와 쉬어갈 수 있게 말이죠","index":3},"5":{"id":5,"start":47.661,"end":51.331,"text":"기다리며 나 버텨볼게요","index":4},"6":{"id":6,"start":52.021,"end":55.841,"text":"우리 만날 수 있는 그날까지","index":5},"7":{"id":7,"start":58.041,"end":64.631,"text":"고독은 날 가만두지 못해요","index":6},"8":{"id":8,"start":65.221,"end":67.481,"text":"아직 어린가 봐요 아파요","index":7},"9":{"id":9,"start":68.511,"end":78.891,"text":"담배연기와 가사들이 방 안에 온통 다 떠다닐 때","index":8},"10":{"id":10,"start":81.071,"end":85.241,"text":"나에게도 언젠가는 따순 봄이 오겠죠","index":9},"11":{"id":11,"start":85.901,"end":90.471,"text":"거칠게 휘몰아치는 이 겨울을 헤치고","index":10},"12":{"id":12,"start":91.341,"end":95.631,"text":"나는 그때 위해 의자 두 개 내놓겠어요","index":11},"13":{"id":13,"start":96.901,"end":101.231,"text":"언제든지 나와 쉬어갈 수 있게 말이죠","index":12},"14":{"id":14,"start":107.301,"end":111.401,"text":"바람 타고 날아와주세요 나의 파랑새","index":13},"15":{"id":15,"start":117.301,"end":121.921,"text":"항상 여기 있을 테니 부디 주저 말고","index":14},"16":{"id":16,"start":123.151,"end":127.601,"text":"와줘요 달콤한 시간을 물어다줘요","index":15},"17":{"id":17,"start":133.301,"end":137.601,"text":"나도 언젠가는 따사로운 봄이 되겠죠","index":16},"18":{"id":18,"start":138.291,"end":142.681,"text":"거칠게 휘몰아치는 이 감정을 헤치고","index":17},"19":{"id":19,"start":143.481,"end":147.971,"text":"나는 그대 위해 좋은 사람이 되겠어요","index":18},"20":{"id":20,"start":148.911,"end":153.341,"text":"언제든지 내게 기대갈 수 있게 말이죠","index":19},"21":{"id":21,"start":159.171,"end":163.401,"text":"바람 타고 마중 나갈게요 나의 파랑새","index":20},"22":{"id":22,"start":169.411,"end":174.781,"text":"항상 여기 있을 테니 부디 주저 말고","index":21}}
transcription_prompt:
Focus exclusively on the spoken words (dialogue, narration) in this {contentType}. Transcribe ONLY the audible speech. Explicitly ignore any song lyrics, background music, on-screen text, and non-speech sounds. Format the output as a sequential transcript. Each line MUST strictly follow the format: [MMmSSsNNNms - MMmSSsNNNms] Transcribed spoken words (1-2 sentences max). For example: [00m30s000ms - 00m35s500ms] This is the spoken dialogue. Always use leading zeros for minutes and seconds (e.g., 00m05s100ms, not 0m5s100ms). Return ONLY the formatted transcript lines of spoken words, with no extra text, headers, or explanations.

IMPORTANT: If there is no spoken dialogue in the audio, return an empty array []. Do not return timestamps with empty text or placeholder text.
